text: Of Love and Other Demons () is a 2009 Costa Rican Colombian drama movie directed by Hilda Hidalgo and based on the novel of the same name by Gabriel García Márquez. It stars Pablo Derqui, Eliza Triana, Jordi Dauder, Damián Alcázar. ==Other websites== * Category:2009 drama movies Category:Costa Rican movies Category:Colombian movies
title: Of Love and Other Demons (movie)
